page.title: 11AN OLD AGE PENSIONER
page.content: An elderly lady of over 70 years of age has lived in the village of Kirkmichael all her life.When she was young there were houses in only two streets and a few situated along the side of the Dyrock Burn.The only transport was the horse and cart and she remembers going round the village using this to deliver milk from a large can.She thinks the village has changed a lot with the recent housing developments and more people living here has helped the community greatly. Her day starts about 10a.m.when she gets up and does some housework.She goes for a walk,does shopping and visits a friend.In the afternoon,if it is fine,she goes walking. If not, she knits and watches television.She has her main meal in the evening and goes to bed at 10.30p.m.
